full_summary:
### Government Tender Announcement
### Title: AMD EPYC 7003 Series - 2U GPU Gen4 Server for the NRCC
### Reference Number: SSC-24-00025659:T
### Solicitation Number: BPM020885/25659
### Tender Closing Date: March 1, 2024, 2:00 PM EST

Shared Services Canada (SSC) is seeking a supplier to provide AMD EPYC 7003 Series - 2U GPU Gen4 Server hardware or equivalent for the National Research Council of Canada (NRCC). The hardware must be delivered to a location in St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador.

Supplier Requirements
-------------------

To be considered responsive, suppliers must comply with all requirements outlined in the bid solicitation. The responsive bid with the lowest evaluated price will be recommended for award of a contract.

Pricing and Delivery
-------------------

Suppliers must submit pricing in accordance with Annex A – List of Deliverables and Pricing, which can be found in the Request for Quotations document. Delivery is required at a location in St. John’s, Newfoundland and Labrador.

Important Notice to Suppliers
----------------------------

Due to the impacts of the COVID-19 pandemic, suppliers are required to submit bids electronically using the Contracting Authority’s email. Faxed and hard copy bids will not be accepted, except in exceptional circumstances.

 PROCUREMENT CATEGORIES
-------------------------

Procurement Category: Goods

[[Procurement Category Description: Automatic Data Processing Equipment - System Configuration]]

Trade Agreements: Canadian Free Trade Agreement (CFTA)

Regions of Opportunity: Canada

Regions of Delivery: Newfoundland and Labrador

Notice Type: Request for Proposal (RFP)

[[Notice Type Description: Demande de propositions]]

Evaluation Criteria: (To be found in the Request for Quotations document)

--------------------

The submission documents can be found at the following links:

https://sscp2pspc.ssc-spc.gc.ca/page.aspx/en/fil/download_public/2A79F939-E6D7-44D8-B3ED-FAE3C98E2F8A (and subsequent links)

Official Languages: English and French
